text: Grade retention is when a student repeats a grade i.e. first grade, second grade, etc. Some students have disabilities and must repeat a grade due to the problem for not meeting their needs in the first place. Either way, grade retention can be emotionally damaging on a student's self-esteem. == Other websites == * Taking Responsibility for Ending Social Promotion: A Guide for Educators and State and Local Leaders. , U.S. Department of Education, May 1999. * Position Statement on Student Grade Retention and Social Promotion. .
